This is a testharness.js-based test.

[FAIL] Test altKey of pointer boundary events (modifiers are changed before move): altKey of pointerout should be true
  assert_true: expected true got false
[FAIL] Test altKey of pointer boundary events (modifiers are changed after move): altKey of pointerover should be true
  assert_true: expected true got false
[FAIL] Test altKey of pointer boundary events (modifiers are changed after move): altKey of pointerout should be true
  assert_true: expected true got false
